name: American Cancer Society: Discovery Shop (Los Altos)
description: Thrift store accepting donations; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in Los Altos is a thrift store selling quality secondhand and vintage items, with proceeds supporting cancer research and patient programs. Seniors 55+ receive 10% off on Tuesdays.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles and vintage items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Discovery Shop at 243 Main St, Los Altos
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Open Mon-Sat 10am-6pm, Sun 10am-5pm
5. Call (650) 949-0505 for info
